original_title: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Live - Light My Fire
overview: A presentation of some of the best moments of speeches, performances and backstage moments of the annual Rock and Roll Hall of Fame ceremonies. Footage was culled from the RockHalls archives and represent 24 years of events
tagline: I wanted to make a record with words like Bob Dylan that sounded like Phil Spector, but most of all I wanted to sing like Roy Orbison." - Bruce Springsteen
title: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Live - Light My Fire
